entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
